about.seoTitle: About Cambizzle | Trusted Marketplace in Cameroon
about.seoDescription: Learn about Cambizzle, Cameroon's premier peer-to-peer marketplace. Connect with buyers and sellers securely and easily.
about.title: About
about.subtitle: Cameroon's trusted peer-to-peer marketplace
about.whoWeAreText: Cambizzle is a Cameroon-based online marketplace dedicated to simplifying the way people buy and sell goods and services. We connect sellers and buyers in a seamless digital environment, making commerce more accessible, efficient, and rewarding for everyone involved.
about.ourMissionText: To empower sellers by providing a platform that makes it easy to showcase and distribute their products and services to a broader audience. At the same time, we offer buyers a user-friendly experience that grants instant access to a diverse range of quality offeringsâ€”saving time and effort.
about.ourVisionText1: Our ambition goes beyond national borders. We aim to expand Cambizzle across Africa, delivering a consistent standard of service that prioritizes customer satisfaction, quality assurance, and community trust.
about.ourVisionText2: At Cambizzle, we believe in the power of technology to transform lives. We are committed to building a marketplace that creates opportunities, supports growth, and drives innovation. For us, failure is not an optionâ€”only progress and impact.
about.joinThousands: Join thousands of users already buying and selling on Cambizzle.
about.contactUs: For more information or support, please contact us at

terms.seoDescription: Read Cambizzle's Terms & Conditions. Understand your rights and responsibilities as a user of our marketplace.
terms.title: Terms &
terms.subtitle: Please read our terms carefully before using Cambizzle
terms.section1Text1: Welcome to Cambizzle. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website
terms.section1Text2: that connects buyers and sellers. By accessing or using our site, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
terms.section1Text3: If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you must not use the Site.
terms.section2Text: You must be at least 18 years old to use the Services. By using the Site, you affirm that you are at least 18 years old, or that you have the permission of a parent or guardian to use the Site.
terms.section3Text: Some parts of the Site may require you to register an account. When registering, you agree to provide accurate, complete, and current information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and for all activities under your account.
terms.section4Item1: You are responsible for the content you post on the Site. You may not post any material that is illegal, defamatory, offensive, or otherwise violates the rights of others.
terms.section4Item2: You agree not to engage in any activity that disrupts or interferes with the operation of the Site.
terms.section4Item3: You are responsible for ensuring that your actions comply with all applicable laws in Cameroon, including data protection and consumer protection laws.
terms.section5Item1: Post illegal or prohibited content, including but not limited to fraud, hate speech, discriminatory material, or content violating intellectual property rights.
terms.section5Item2: Engage in spam, scams, or fraudulent transactions.
terms.section5Item3: Use the Site for any unlawful or unauthorized purposes.
terms.section6Item1: Users may list items for sale, rent, or trade on the Site, subject to compliance with these Terms and applicable laws in Cameroon.
terms.section6Item2: Transactions and communication between users are conducted at their own risk. We do not guarantee the quality, authenticity, or legality of the goods and services listed.
terms.section6Item3: We recommend users exercise caution and verify the details of any transaction before entering into agreements.
terms.section7Item1: Cambizzle may charge fees for certain premium listings or services. All fees, if applicable, will be clearly outlined on the Site.
terms.section7Item2: All payments must be made through approved payment methods. By making a payment, you agree to the payment terms set forth by the payment provider.
terms.section8Text: By using the Site, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as described in our Privacy Policy.
terms.section9Item1: The content, design, and trademarks on the Site are owned by Cambizzle or licensed to us. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any material from the Site without permission.
terms.section9Item2: Users retain ownership of the content they post but grant Cambizzle a license to use, display, and distribute such content on the Site and other related platforms.
terms.section10Item1: The Site is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, express or implied.
terms.section10Item2: We do not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of any content on the Site.
terms.section10Item3: We are not responsible for any losses, damages, or liabilities arising from your use of the Site, including any disputes between users.
terms.section11Text: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the Site or Services at any time for violating these Terms or engaging in unlawful conduct.
terms.section12Text: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Cameroon. Any disputes arising under or in connection with these Terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Cameroon.
terms.section13Text: We reserve the right to modify or update these Terms at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the effective date will be updated. You are encouraged to review these Terms periodically.
terms.section14Text: If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

safetyPage.seoDescription: Important safety tips for buying and selling on Cambizzle. Learn how to stay safe while using our marketplace.
safetyPage.title: Stay Safe on
safetyPage.subtitle: Essential safety tips for secure buying and selling
safetyPage.welcomeText1: As a user of www.cambizzle.com, we want to ensure you have a safe experience. Here are some important safety tips to follow:
safetyPage.welcomeText2: Following these tips can help ensure a safer experience while using our platform. Stay safe and enjoy your transactions!
safetyPage.tip1Title: Meet in Public or Safe Places
safetyPage.tip1Desc: Always arrange to meet buyers or sellers in well-lit, public locations, preferably during daylight hours. Avoid meeting in suspicious or secluded areas.
safetyPage.tip2Title: Bring a Friend or Family Member
safetyPage.tip2Desc: Whenever possible, bring someone with you for added safety. Let a friend or family member know your whereabouts and who you meet.
safetyPage.tip3Desc: Check the reviews and ratings of sellers on the website. Avoid dealing with users who have negative feedback or no history. Keep a record of any chat history. If possible, use video calls or voice chats to confirm the other party's identity.
safetyPage.tip4Desc: For physical goods, thoroughly inspect the item before making any payment. For services, be sure you understand the terms and conditions before committing.
safetyPage.tip5Title: Avoid Prepayment and Use Secure Payment Methods
safetyPage.tip5Desc: Refrain from making advance payments when the goods have not been inspected, or the service has not been provided. Avoid cash transactions for high-value items. Instead, use secure payment methods like Mobile Money, Orange Money, or Bank Transfers.
safetyPage.tip6Desc: If something feels off or too good to be true, trust your instincts and walk away. Report suspicious users or listings to the platform immediately.
safetyPage.tip7Desc: Be alert for common scams, such as overpayment schemes, very low prices, or requests for upfront fees. Exercise caution with deals that seem too good to be true.
safetyPage.tip8Desc: If you encounter scams, fraud, or suspicious behaviour, report it to the platform's support team immediately. Help keep the community safe by flagging inappropriate content or users.
safetyPage.buyerTip1Desc: Review the seller's history, ratings, and number of successful transactions.
safetyPage.buyerTip2Desc: Don't hesitate to ask detailed questions about the item's condition, age, and any defects.
safetyPage.buyerTip3Desc: Ask for additional photos or videos if the listing photos look suspicious or incomplete.
safetyPage.buyerTip4Desc: When using cash, count it carefully before handing it over.
safetyPage.buyerTip5Desc: For electronics, test them on the spot if possible. For vehicles, consider getting an inspection.
safetyPage.buyerTip6Desc: Ask for a written receipt or take a photo of the transaction for your records.
safetyPage.sellerTip1Desc: Provide honest and detailed descriptions of your items, including any flaws or wear.
safetyPage.sellerTip2Desc: Clear, well-lit photos from multiple angles help build trust and reduce disputes.
safetyPage.sellerTip3Desc: Answer questions quickly and thoroughly to build confidence with potential buyers.
safetyPage.sellerTip4Desc: Research similar items to ensure your pricing is competitive and realistic.
safetyPage.sellerTip5Desc: Check their profile history and ratings before meeting.
safetyPage.sellerTip6Desc: Always count cash in front of the buyer before concluding the transaction.
safetyPage.redFlagsTitle: ðŸš© Red Flags to Watch For
safetyPage.redFlag1: Requests to pay outside of normal methods or in untraceable ways
safetyPage.redFlag2: Urgency or pressure to complete the transaction quickly
safetyPage.redFlag3: Sellers or buyers who avoid meeting in person
safetyPage.redFlag4: Unusually low prices for high-value items
safetyPage.redFlag5: Requests for your personal or financial information
safetyPage.redFlag6: Poor grammar or suspicious communication patterns
safetyPage.redFlag7: Accounts with no history or reviews
safetyPage.redFlag8: Photos that appear to be copied from other listings
safetyPage.reportText: If you encounter fraud, harassment, or any suspicious activity, please report it immediately to our team:
safetyPage.reportNote: We take all reports seriously and investigate suspicious accounts and transactions. Your report helps keep Cambizzle safe for everyone.
safetyPage.learnMoreText: For more information about Cambizzle, check out our other pages:
